entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Overcast. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Overcast. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
